name: GES Location
action:
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(PMD_Labour_Details).Row(1).Column(PMD_Ges_Location).GetDisplayValue )*>,None)){<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(CE PMD GES Engineer %)*><*CTX( Container(PMD Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX( Container(PMD Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(CE PMD GES Engineer %)*><*CTX( Container(PMD Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX( Container(PMD Engineering Labor Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*>}[ENDIF]


[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(PMD_Labour_Details).Row(1).Column(PMD_Ges_Location).GetDisplayValue )*>,None)){<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(PMD CE LD GES Engineer %)*><*CTX( Container(PMD Labor Additional Custom Deliverable).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX( Container(PMD Labor Additional Custom Deliverable).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(PMD CE LD GES Engineer %)*><*CTX( Container(PMD Labor Additional Custom Deliverable).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*><*CTX( Container(PMD Labor Additional Custom Deliverable).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*>}[ENDIF]
description: This script removes GES fields from the Labor Container and attributes, if there is no GES Location.
